locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Not the worst pilot I have been to but close. This is mainly for the truck drivers, pilot app down so you have to pay for shower. The dubkin doughnuts prominently displayed on their sign and yet the dunkin doughnut coffee is not ready and ‚Ä¶

I was skeptical about stopping here due to all the 1 star reviews about the showers with no photo evidence, but looks clean to me. Granted this at 2pm and it's not busy, but still, looks like a typical clean Pilot shower to me

Showers are always barely clean. They have no keys and have not replaced shower keys because people keep leaving with them. No hooks on the wall. Ceiling Fans don't work. Half the time the toilet is filthy. Always have to wait to get a ‚Ä¶

First of all....this isn't a pilot. The manager said they just sell pilot gas. Also, if you shower here I hope you love cold water! Horrible experience here. But the manager was very nice and refund our showers and gave us 2 free drinks.

Poor service,  the showers don't have limit time, i was waiting for 40min and when you request a gentil explanation for the staff, they answered you very rude as if that is a home and you are receiving a favor, another fact if you received ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ number.  I went to another pump.  The pump next my pump didnt work neither.  That driver came to my pump and realized it didnt work.  Then he move to another pump.  The gravel lot has a lot of trash.  Shower #1 had several flies in there.
Got a shower which was clean and whatever air freshener that was in the shower smelled good.
Nice clean shower..friendly, helpful staff..plenty of parking...
It's a truck stop, you can get a shower get a hot meal and you can park there.
Wouldn't recommend a shower here but a good place to park and get a biscuit

locations.title: Petro Travel Center
locations.content: Petro Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Came late at night and plenty of parking in the truck lot. Shower was clean, food from IHOP was ready in 15mins tasted great and workers in there was super nice. What more can a trucker ask for üôèüèæ‚ù§Ô∏è ‚Ä¶

They said they're not allowed to let truckers take showers right now because there's a boil water notice caused by a storm. I'm not trying to drink the shower water. A shower wouldn't hurt me any more than a swim in a lake would hurt me. Ju ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ amazing. My hubby got chops and I got grilled chicken. He got sweet potatoes and collards, I got collards and Mac-n-chrese. And the lady behind the window where you pay for fuel was just as sweet as can be. Shower was roomy, good, and hot.

Disgusting shower wasn‚Äôt even clean, still had someone‚Äôs razor in the shower and hair
Never again Petro and TA they gotta do better truckers deserve a clean and disinfectant shower
Shower room is not bad. Pls see this hair dryer. I think they found it outside or anyone donate here.

Not bad Overall - shower nice - food in diner dry I ordered Beef tips, garlic butter brocoli, & red mashed potato‚Äôs (no butter or garlic in them) (or gravy I requested) 28$ should at least get what‚Äôs promised on menu. Waitress disappeared ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Second, the shower took a long time to warm up. Once I got in, it slowly continued to get hotter and I had to adjust it a couple times. Even after the adjustments, the water temperature would randomly spike to about 130¬∞ for a second or two ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Travel Ctr . Can say was pleased with ample parking clean property friendly staff . Shower / maint. attendants  Will & Julie  if I'm not mistaken  they were very attentive provided a nice clean shower very appreciated.  C- Store well ‚Ä¶
Clean shower awesome laundry Morning and afternoon shift awesome but night shift lazy. He would not fill cheese for nachos and and all the grill food had to warm in microwave. Do better buddy.

Stopped here to eat and shower not bad. People are great here. Showers are just like all the rest are ok. Wanted to update here this has gotten really bad to come here. I reserved parking because I was coming in late well got here no ‚Ä¶

locations.title: 85 Truck Plaza
locations.content: 85 Truck Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ and was still super friendly. The cook came out and  he was super friendly. I'm glad to have places like this out here compared to the major chains. I didn't inquire about the shower since I had one this morning so I can't comment on that.
Pics of shower and some mold on the curtains. Good place to park and get snacks. Would recommend finding a shower elsewhere.

‚Ä¶ was free(I think)Nice amount of parking, Good service, Quiet area and some on site cooked food which I enjoyed their fried catfish. However, the shower bathrooms was'nt working this time that I came. So, make sure you get some shower wipes

‚Ä¶ because of this; when you spend hundreds of dollars for fuel and are told that you should chose between the shower or the parking is completely ridiculous, all truck chains offer free parking and shower with the purchase of 60 gallons ‚Ä¶

10 bucks parking after 5pm, 10 bucks for a shower, Restaurant is closed down until health inspector okays it to open, 2 bucks for a cup of warm old coffee, but hey its 11 minutes away from Wal-Mart Sam's if you have business there as I do ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ employee around with a knife he was really looking to cut/kill someone. On top of that the attitude of the entire staff is terrible. I think the owner might be racist. The building is horrible, no one should try taking a shower in there.

Was charged parking, even after we ate in their restaurant, when staff told us we would have to pay. Shower, we're very unkept. It will do in a pinch but would stay somewhere instead. A last resort truck stop.

Would give 0 stars 10.00 to park mostly a gravel lot full of potholes.  10.00 for a shower. Have to get 100 gal of fuel for free parking or a shower. There fuel prices are ridiculous  NO REAL FOOD. The is absurd for our truckers you should ‚Ä¶
I pay $8.00 for an nasty shower. The services sucks, parking lot nasty. It need to be shut down n rebuild it. Lots of upgrade needed. I will never stop here again. I'm a truck driver..
Well it seems like a cle an truck stop. But 10 dollars to park10 dollars for shower, no real food,what a joke, must fuel 100 gallons for free shower,another joke,Will never stop here again

showerReviews.reviewText: Exceptionally Clean & Spacious Showers ‚Äì A Great Stop! ‚Ä¶

30 something degrees outside. Showers close to the door. Very cold shower rooms. Shower doesn't let you turn it hotter. Any body part that wasn't in the water was freezing cold. Very upset. I was so uncomfortable in that shower. So cold no ‚Ä¶

Went in to get a shower, and the handheld shower head was gone, the hose hanging off to the side behind a grab bar.  The tile grout below the waist is all black. Don't  know if it is black mold or just grossness. They offered me another ‚Ä¶
The showers here don't work. They just run cold, and out of both shower hands at the same time. Tried multiple showers. The entire system needs ripped out of the wall and replumbed from scratch.

‚Ä¶ well lit lot but not too bright either. The store was clean and organized well. The staff on the trucking side was quick and friendly. The shower was clean and nicely designed. Definitely in my top 5 Love's so far. Keep up the good work!

The fact that it's freezing outside and this loves showers are cold is crazy I had to take a lukewarm shower after driving all day is not cool no pun intended I was in shower 1 so maybe the other showers are better but this shower SUCKS

Dirtiest loves I've been to... the showers are disgusting...0 stars ... the showers do not get cleaned at all... I have videos and pictures,  and when we ( me and my wife ) got out of the shower we went to grab a drink from the coolers and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of the nicer truck stops around. The staff  is always very friendly and helpful. The shower and restrooms are clean. You have a choice of Subway or McDonald's or you can get something from the store. They also have a tire / mechanic ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ IN A TRUCK STOP! The guy in Orange is scrubbing a toilet in the back ground. Hope these don't end back up in the shower rooms, because throwing towels away is a very capitalist thing to do. Please steam clean showers at least once a month
The stuff is so rude, I had to wait for 3 hours for a shower with only 1 customer in line, they didn't want to clean used showers.

showerReviews.reviewText: Shower 10 $..always find a park ...nice people..

‚Ä¶ A great variety of trinkets and little fun things, including various cowperson hats. The restrooms are very nice and also clean, and the showers are FANTASTIC. A personal locking room with shower, toilet  sink and vanity mirror, and nice ‚Ä¶

Awesome experience. Friendly staff when I went to pay for a shower the clerk said don't worry about it unless you want me to charge you ... I really didn't expect that. The showers and restrooms were really clean .. Would definitely ‚Ä¶
Good place to shower eat and sleep for sure clean place all around really good price's on items üëå ‚Ä¶

What a fantastic find. After sleeping in empty parking lots and side streets due to loading and unloading times(grrrrrrrrrrrrrr) I happened upon this gem. Fantastic customer service and a FREE shower. Yup. FREE. It's better than a Loves and ‚Ä¶
Clean spaces; plenty of snacks to choose from; Dunkin' Donuts and another eatery on site. Also has a shower area! üöø ‚Ä¶
Great place old school charm one on 95 at ext 8 is the same woman gave me free shower and coffee they that at the big commercial chains always parking
Nice truck stop  good service, friendly  clean shower  and restroom  üöΩ. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the place ,nice truck parking, clean restaurants,the only thing I could see wrong or confusing to me is the truck drivers shower set up,not really pleased with the whole set up,it makes no sense to me, after 41years of driving truck ,to ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: No clean shower !After being on the  road for a full day a nice hot shower would have been great. Cece the cashier was extremely rude . She stated if we wanted a shower to go up the road to Love's

New nice truckstop, big showers clean restrooms. Two complains: restroom has no paper towels, faucet in shower has no adjusted water temperature..nice location with lots of food... across the street is big gym( weights and boxing gym) so we ‚Ä¶
Decent staff and good showers. No shower curtains so water is all on the floors when finished. Not great air circulation while taking a shower but overall nice small store

‚Ä¶ Walmart right behind tho has lots and let's us there. Cozy, clean. Motion sensor faucet in the shower tho, ugh. Did get the little bar of soap and 2 towels plus bath mat and wash rag. Just like TA/Petro. 5 guys burger 25 steps away. Needs ‚Ä¶
No Landry no shower no truk stop

at #899 in South Hill, Va I had to take a cold shower. It started out hot for about 5 mins then it went ice cold. Finally after about 10 mins it got hot again, but my back was scalded because it got extremely hot all of a sudden. Also, the ‚Ä¶

We can around 10:50 pm , but before we got there I call to ask if they have showers , They Told me yes and I told them ok we are coming in right now, We ask for the shower they said they were busy changing shift, and The guy  name West ley ‚Ä¶
Great location, fuel, shower, hot food. Walmart is a walking distance. Limited parking.
Nice bathrooms. Nice people. Service was good. Bummed this wasn't a full Pilot location with a shower.
Cold showers no pressure sink didn't work waist of a shower credit.

‚Ä¶ it clean, Lots of parking. Good snack drink food selections, Little Ceasars was good. Only problem was my shower went from really hot to freezing cold Im less then a minute. Please fix the showers and ill come back! I was in green shower. üíö ‚Ä¶
Trucker here. I paid $14 for a shower and $2 for a coffee at a Petro fuel station near of Lexington, VA. When I came here, I expected something close to that price for a shower and coffee. ‚Ä¶
This place is great. Huge parking lot and the shower was roomy and clean. Staff was extra nice.
Best place for a shower in the trucking industry on the east coast. Good food at the dinner behind them too
You can't get a team shower.you have to pay for 2 shower's $10 each

‚Ä¶ restroom it was gross 3 sinks and only one was letting out a drop or two what the hell. Laundry room had at least 4 machines out of service Dam this place is run down.  I didn't dare to shower hell no. My advice is enter at your own risk.

‚Ä¶ is an complete and total lie. You should be ashamed. Ive been to a lot of hole in the walls and have NEVER seen anything like the nastiness i just witnessed. I have to go shower at loves just because I used your bathroom! Disgusting!!!!

Good amount of parking too

showerReviews.reviewText: Exceptionally Clean & Spacious Showers ‚Äì A Great Stop! ‚Ä¶

30 something degrees outside. Showers close to the door. Very cold shower rooms. Shower doesn't let you turn it hotter. Any body part that wasn't in the water was freezing cold. Very upset. I was so uncomfortable in that shower. So cold no ‚Ä¶

Went in to get a shower, and the handheld shower head was gone, the hose hanging off to the side behind a grab bar.  The tile grout below the waist is all black. Don't  know if it is black mold or just grossness. They offered me another ‚Ä¶
The showers here don't work. They just run cold, and out of both shower hands at the same time. Tried multiple showers. The entire system needs ripped out of the wall and replumbed from scratch.

‚Ä¶ well lit lot but not too bright either. The store was clean and organized well. The staff on the trucking side was quick and friendly. The shower was clean and nicely designed. Definitely in my top 5 Love's so far. Keep up the good work!

The fact that it's freezing outside and this loves showers are cold is crazy I had to take a lukewarm shower after driving all day is not cool no pun intended I was in shower 1 so maybe the other showers are better but this shower SUCKS

Dirtiest loves I've been to... the showers are disgusting...0 stars ... the showers do not get cleaned at all... I have videos and pictures,  and when we ( me and my wife ) got out of the shower we went to grab a drink from the coolers and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of the nicer truck stops around. The staff  is always very friendly and helpful. The shower and restrooms are clean. You have a choice of Subway or McDonald's or you can get something from the store. They also have a tire / mechanic ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ IN A TRUCK STOP! The guy in Orange is scrubbing a toilet in the back ground. Hope these don't end back up in the shower rooms, because throwing towels away is a very capitalist thing to do. Please steam clean showers at least once a month
The stuff is so rude, I had to wait for 3 hours for a shower with only 1 customer in line, they didn't want to clean used showers.

showerReviews.reviewText: This TA is perfectly located for my weekly route, so I‚Äôm here 2‚Äì3 times a week for fuel and showers. Shower rooms are large and clean, though my wife says the water doesn‚Äôt get hot enough for her‚Äîcold showers don‚Äôt bother me. Fuel island ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ it clean, Lots of parking. Good snack drink food selections, Little Ceasars was good. Only problem was my shower went from really hot to freezing cold Im less then a minute. Please fix the showers and ill come back! I was in green shower. üíö ‚Ä¶
Trucker here. I paid $14 for a shower and $2 for a coffee at a Petro fuel station near of Lexington, VA. When I came here, I expected something close to that price for a shower and coffee. ‚Ä¶
This place is great. Huge parking lot and the shower was roomy and clean. Staff was extra nice.
Best place for a shower in the trucking industry on the east coast. Good food at the dinner behind them too
You can't get a team shower.you have to pay for 2 shower's $10 each
Very good service good shower

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ lot, which provides ample space for trucks and other vehicles. The shower facilities are really cheap and exceptionally clean, making it a great value for travelers. The entire facility is meticulously maintained, with a strong emphasis on ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ travel plaza with old school amenities!  Fuel prices that beats anyone within 100 mi for sure. They offer the drivers a complimentary shower with fill up.  The entire grounds is beautiful concrete. No potholes, no gravel.  On site ‚Ä¶

I came here to sit tight until my pick up time was able to get parking with no issues (park here for free ) . Shower were ok , stopped at the diner and ate , I would give the restaurant 5 stars as well for good food and good customer ‚Ä¶

UPDATE: Showers are now $10

Sad that adult men and women need a notice like in the picture.
Cashier was very nice.
$5 shower but must have a CDL.
Cashier holds CDL until you return shower key.
Shower room small but clean.
Very hot showers 10.00 ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ restaurant. The staff has been extremely friendly.The showers are clean other reviews said five dollars for a shower it was ten which is still cheaper than the big truck stops, parking is great.The spaces are big lots of room to back in.

Not a bad place. Definitely recommend if you want a good HOT shower don‚Äôt even bother. Water was warm at best and shower towels were soaking wet like they had just came out the washer and folded them without going through the dryer. Shower ‚Ä¶

Nice place to park a semi, food from the diner was just ok, but the customer service in there was wonderful. The showers need some attention. There's no exhaust fan or even a regular fan in there so it gets unbearably hot. You take a shower ‚Ä¶
Good friendly people. Food was great. Limited menu, only reason for 4 stars. Free parking just register when you get there, 5$ shower nd definitely one of the best I had on the road.

Had to spend my 34hr reset here, loved it. Fuel was lower priced, the parking area was all concrete with no cracks or potholes, showers are free with fill up or $15. My shower had one of those rain shower heads (the best).  There's a diner ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice place, just glad they have a very decent shower, clean, and cant ask for too much;)

‚Ä¶ . I have a puppy in my truck that got sick. Asked if I could shower my dog,was told "no state of Virginia has laws against animals being in areas with prepped food". Absolutely not true,because any other truck stop in Virginia allows dogs ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the lady said upstairs. Went upstairs, and the place was full waiting to use the 2 unisex bathrooms. I noticed that one of the many shower doors was open. I walked over, and there was a cleaning lady in their cleaning. I asked if we could ‚Ä¶

Absolutely horrible!! Came here as a trucker for a 10 hour break and shower and it will be the last time. Huge craters in the parking lot, spots all on horrible slants, and the shower was FILTHY. The entire upstairs reeks of urine, and ‚Ä¶
75 gallons of fuel gets a free shower. Cheaper fuel. Staff is always great too. Showers are nice drivers room upstairs. Easy in easy out. I usally always stop here as a owner operator

This place is horrible and disgusting! Went to take a shower and there were bugs crawling and flying everywhere. There was no air conditioning, just a 20yr old beat up box fan covered in oil and dirt. Towels were stained with black oil ‚Ä¶

$5 Shower with fuel purchase. $10 without fuel. Has Subway restaurant. Store sells sandwiches, pizza, hotdogs, etc. Clean facility. Trucker lounge upstairs. Adequate parking. Unable to get food deliveries in this area....
I'm just a tourist, but it seemed like a nice place for truckers to lounge, shower and eat. I ate there at subway. It was good.
It's a great place that has so many things to explore and a whole upstairs to explore and shower and wash clothes in
